name: FLATLINE

optics.description: Optic attachments, or sights, are attachments that give zoom and more precision to guns. They offer magnification while aiming down sights

clips.description: Extended magazines increase the amount of ammo per magazine for their respective Ammo type. The increase to the magazine size will vary with each weapon and rarity of the magazine attached. Epic (level three) being the highest capacity and common (level one) being the lowest.

stocks.description: Improves weapon switch speed and aim sway.
stocks.commonDescription: Improves handling and reduces aim drift. (Raising/lowering weapon is 15% faster)
stocks.rareDescription: Quicker handling and moderate aim drift reduction. (Raising/lowering weapon is 25% faster)
stocks.epicDescription: Fast handling and large aim drift reduction. (Raising/lowering weapon is 35% faster)

description: 2x headshot multiplier. High damage per shot. Good performance at close/medium range. Can be changed to Automatic or Single-Fire fire modes. Best in class hipfire performance and somewhat easy to control recoil. Poor long-range performance. Average projectile speed. Bouncy recoil.
